title: Is the Brain the Seat of the Soul, with Neuroscientist Anil Seth
description:
Jillian searches for the seat of the soul, the nature of consciousness, and what elements make us uniquely ourselves, with renowned neuroscientist Anil Seth.

Guest Links:

www.anilseth.com

Twitter: @anilkseth

Coming Sept 2021, Anil's book, Being You: A New Science of Consciousness


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
